MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the G3 postcode area of Glasgow. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 1pm to repair an underground cable on Dalhousie Street and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12.32pm on Tuesday 19th January 2021.
